text: Dean Elmer Hess (December 6, 1917 â€“ March 2, 2015) was an American minister and United States Air Force colonel. He was involved in the so-called "Kiddy Car Airlift". It was the rescue of 950 orphans and 80 orphanage staff from the path of the Chinese advance during the Korean War on December 20, 1950. ==Other websites== *IMDB Battle Hymn 1957 film *Obituary for Milton Bellovin, participant in the "Kiddy Car Airlift." title: Dean Hess
